detaileddescription.para:
Convert a service flag (NODE_*) to a human readable string. It supports unknown service flags which will be returned as "UNKNOWN[...]".
bit
the service flag is calculated as (1 << bit)

Convert service flags (a bitmask of NODE_*) to human readable strings. It supports unknown service flags which will be returned as "UNKNOWN[...]".
flags
multiple NODE_* bitwise-OR-ed together
Convert a TX/WITNESS_TX/WTX CInv to a GenTxid.
